title: Softball
description: A softball, which is differentiated from a baseball by size (it is larger, though hard to tell in emoji form) and color (yellow, not white).
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the softball emoji is presented as a perfectly spherical orb, showcasing Appleâ€™s hallmark glossy 3D shading and vibrant, true-to-life coloring. The iconic red stitching stands out against the pristine white surface, each stitch rendered with a subtle highlight that gives it a tactile, almost touchable quality. This emoji, with its clean lines and soft rounded edges typical of Appleâ€™s design, is a clear and direct representation of the sport, often used in contexts related to athletics, games, or a friendly competition.
